verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> And it came to pass כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when זָקֵ֣ן <WH2204> was old יִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> that when Isaac וַתִּכְהֶ֥יןָ <WH3543> were dim עֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> and his eyes מֵרְאֹ֑ת <WH7200> so that he could not see וַיִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> he called אֶת־ <WH853> עֵשָׂ֣ו ׀ <WH6215> Esau בְּנ֣וֹ <WH1121> son הַגָּדֹ֗ל <WH1419> his eldest וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him בְּנִ֔י <WH1121> unto him My son וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and he said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> Here

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֖א <WH4994> now זָקַ֑נְתִּי <WH2204> Behold now I am old לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> I know י֥וֹם <WH3117> not the day מוֹתִֽי׃ <WH4194> of my death

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now שָׂא־ <WH5375> Now therefore take נָ֣א <WH4994> please כֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH3627> I pray thee thy weapons תֶּלְיְךָ֖ <WH8522> thy quiver וְקַשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <WH7198> and thy bow וְצֵא֙ <WH3318> and go out הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> to the field וְצ֥וּדָה <WH6679> and take לִּ֖י [צֵידָה כ] (צָֽיִד׃ <WH6720> meat ק)

וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> And make לִ֨י מַטְעַמִּ֜ים <WH4303> me savoury meat כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> such as אָהַ֛בְתִּי <WH157> I love וְהָבִ֥יאָה <WH935> and bring לִּ֖י וְאֹכֵ֑לָה <WH398> [it] to me that I may eat בַּעֲב֛וּר <WH5668> so תְּבָרֶכְךָ֥ <WH1288> may bless נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> that my soul בְּטֶ֥רֶם <WH2962> thee before אָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> I die

וְרִבְקָ֣ה <WH7259> And Rebekah שֹׁמַ֔עַת <WH8085> heard בְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> when Isaac אֶל־ <WH413> about עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> to Esau בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went עֵשָׂו֙ <WH6215> And Esau הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> to the field לָצ֥וּד <WH6679> to hunt צַ֖יִד <WH6718> [for] venison לְהָבִֽיא׃ <WH935> [and] to bring

וְרִבְקָה֙ <WH7259> And Rebekah אָֽמְרָ֔ה <WH559> spake אֶל־ <WH413> about יַעֲקֹ֥ב <WH3290> unto Jacob בְּנָ֖הּ <WH1121> her son לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> Behold I heard אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father מְדַבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> speak אֶל־ <WH413> about עֵשָׂ֥ו <WH6215> unto Esau אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> thy brother לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הָבִ֨יאָה <WH935> Bring לִּ֥י צַ֛יִד <WH6718> me venison וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> and make לִ֥י מַטְעַמִּ֖ים <WH4303> me savoury meat וְאֹכֵ֑לָה <WH398> that I may eat וַאֲבָרֶכְכָ֛ה <WH1288> and bless לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> thee before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מוֹתִֽי׃ <WH4194> my death

וְעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> Now בְנִ֖י <WH1121> Now therefore my son שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> obey בְּקֹלִ֑י <WH6963> my voice לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> according to that which אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I מְצַוָּ֥ה <WH6680> I command אֹתָֽךְ׃ <WH853>

לֶךְ־ <WH1980> Go נָא֙ <WH4994> now אֶל־ <WH413> to הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> now to the flock וְקַֽח־ <WH3947> and fetch לִ֣י מִשָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> there שְׁנֵ֛י <WH8147> me from thence two גְּדָיֵ֥י <WH1423> kids עִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> of the goats טֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> good וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> and I will make אֹתָ֧ם <WH853> מַטְעַמִּ֛ים <WH4303> them savoury meat לְאָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> for thy father כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he אָהֵֽב׃ <WH157> such as he loveth

וְהֵבֵאתָ֥ <WH935> And thou shalt bring לְאָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> [it] to thy father וְאָכָ֑ל <WH398> that he may eat בַּעֲבֻ֛ר <WH5668> so אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and that יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <WH1288> he may bless לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> thee before מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH4194> his death

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> about רִבְקָ֖ה <WH7259> to Rebekah אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> his mother הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold עֵשָׂ֤ו <WH6215> Behold Esau אָחִי֙ <WH251> my brother אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man שָׂעִ֔ר <WH8163> [is] a hairy וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man חָלָֽק׃ <WH2509> and I [am] a smooth

אוּלַ֤י <WH194> Perhaps יְמֻשֵּׁ֙נִי֙ <WH4959> peradventure will feel אָבִ֔י <WH1> My father וְהָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> become בְעֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> me and I shall seem כִּמְתַעְתֵּ֑עַ <WH8591> to him as a deceiver וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <WH935> and I shall bring עָלַ֛י <WH5921> upon קְלָלָ֖ה <WH7045> a curse וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not בְרָכָֽה׃ <WH1293> upon me and not a blessing

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother עָלַ֥י <WH5921> unto קִלְלָתְךָ֖ <WH7045> unto him Upon me [be] thy curse בְּנִ֑י <WH1121> my son אַ֛ךְ <WH389> only שְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> only obey בְּקֹלִ֖י <WH6963> my voice וְלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> and go קַֽח־ <WH3947> fetch לִֽי׃

וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> went וַיִּקַּ֔ח <WH3947> and fetched וַיָּבֵ֖א <WH935> and brought לְאִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> [them] to his mother וַתַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> made אִמּוֹ֙ <WH517> and his mother מַטְעַמִּ֔ים <WH4303> savoury meat כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after אָהֵ֥ב <WH157> loved אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> such as his father

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took רִ֠בְקָה <WH7259> And Rebekah אֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֨י <WH899> raiment עֵשָׂ֜ו <WH6215> Esau בְּנָ֤הּ <WH1121> son הַגָּדֹל֙ <WH1419> of her eldest הַחֲמֻדֹ֔ת <WH2532> goodly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אִתָּ֖הּ <WH854> her in בַּבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> which [were] with her in the house וַתַּלְבֵּ֥שׁ <WH3847> and put them upon אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob בְּנָ֥הּ <WH1121> son הַקָּטָֽן׃ <WH6996> her younger

וְאֵ֗ת <WH853> עֹרֹת֙ <WH5785> the skins גְּדָיֵ֣י <WH1423> of the kids הָֽעִזִּ֔ים <WH5795> of the goats הִלְבִּ֖ישָׁה <WH3847> And she put עַל־ <WH5921> on יָדָ֑יו <WH3027> upon his hands וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and on חֶלְקַ֥ת <WH2513> and upon the smooth צַוָּארָֽיו׃ <WH6677> of his neck

וַתִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> And she gave אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּטְעַמִּ֛ים <WH4303> the savoury meat וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַלֶּ֖חֶם <WH3899> and the bread אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑תָה <WH6213> which she had prepared בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> into the hand יַעֲקֹ֥ב <WH3290> Jacob בְּנָֽהּ׃ <WH1121> of her son

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> And he came אֶל־ <WH413> to his אָבִ֖יו <WH1> unto his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אָבִ֑י <WH1> My father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and he said הִנֶּ֔נִּי <WH2009> Here מִ֥י <WH4310> I am Who אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you בְּנִֽי׃ <WH1121> afflicted

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> to his אָבִ֗יו <WH1> unto his father אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I עֵשָׂ֣ו <WH6215> I [am] Esau בְּכֹרֶ֔ךָ <WH1060> thy firstborn עָשִׂ֕יתִי <WH6213> I have done כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> according as thou badest אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about קֽוּם־ <WH6965> me arise נָ֣א <WH4994> please שְׁבָ֗ה <WH3427> I pray thee sit וְאָכְלָה֙ <WH398> and eat מִצֵּידִ֔י <WH6718> of my venison בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> that תְּבָרֲכַ֥נִּי <WH1288> may bless נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> that thy soul

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יִצְחָק֙ <WH3327> And Isaac אֶל־ <WH413> to his בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> unto his son מַה־ <WH4100> How זֶּ֛ה <WH2088> he מִהַ֥רְתָּ <WH4116> [it] so quickly לִמְצֹ֖א <WH4672> How [is it] that thou hast found בְּנִ֑י <WH1121> to his son וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> said כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because הִקְרָ֛ה <WH7136> brought יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Because the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> [it] to me

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יִצְחָק֙ <WH3327> And Isaac אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> unto Jacob גְּשָׁה־ <WH5066> Come near נָּ֥א <WH4994> Please וַאֲמֻֽשְׁךָ֖ <WH4184> I pray thee that I may feel בְּנִ֑י <WH1121> thee my son הַֽאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you זֶ֛ה <WH2088> whether thou [be] my very בְּנִ֥י <WH1121> son עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> Esau אִם־ <WH518> or לֹֽא׃ <WH3808> not

וַיִּגַּ֧שׁ <WH5066> went near יַעֲקֹ֛ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> to יִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> unto Isaac אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father וַיְמֻשֵּׁ֑הוּ <WH4959> and he felt וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> him and said הַקֹּל֙ <WH6963> The voice ק֣וֹל <WH6963> voice יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> [is] Jacob's וְהַיָּדַ֖יִם <WH3027> but the hands יְדֵ֥י <WH3027> [are] the hands עֵשָֽׂו׃ <WH6215> of Esau

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not הִכִּיר֔וֹ <WH5234> And he discerned כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become יָדָ֗יו <WH3027> him not because his hands כִּידֵ֛י <WH3027> hands עֵשָׂ֥ו <WH6215> Esau's אָחִ֖יו <WH251> as his brother שְׂעִרֹ֑ת <WH8163> were hairy וַֽיְבָרְכֵֽהוּ׃ <WH1288> so he blessed
וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> are you זֶ֖ה <WH2088> really בְּנִ֣י <WH1121> [Art] thou my very son עֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> Esau וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> he

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said הַגִּ֤שָׁה <WH5066> Bring [it] near לִּי֙ וְאֹֽכְלָה֙ <WH398> to me and I will eat מִצֵּ֣יד <WH6718> venison בְּנִ֔י <WH1121> of my son's לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because of תְּבָֽרֶכְךָ֖ <WH1288> may bless נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> that my soul וַיַּגֶּשׁ־ <WH5066> thee And he brought [it] near לוֹ֙ וַיֹּאכַ֔ל <WH398> to him and he did eat וַיָּ֧בֵא <WH935> and he brought ל֦וֹ יַ֖יִן <WH3196> him wine וַיֵּֽשְׁתְּ׃ <WH8354> and he drank

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> Isaac אָבִ֑יו <WH1> And his father גְּשָׁה־ <WH5066> unto him Come near נָּ֥א <WH4994> Please וּשְׁקָה־ <WH5401> now and kiss לִּ֖י בְּנִֽי׃ <WH1121> me my son

וַיִּגַּשׁ֙ <WH5066> And he came near וַיִּשַּׁק־ <WH5401> and kissed ל֔וֹ וַיָּ֛רַח <WH7306> him and he smelled אֶת־ <WH853> רֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> the smell בְּגָדָ֖יו <WH899> of his raiment וַֽיְבָרֲכֵ֑הוּ <WH1288> and blessed וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> him and said רְאֵה֙ <WH7200> See רֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> the smell בְּנִ֔י <WH1121> of my son כְּרֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> [is] as the smell שָׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> of a field אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בֵּרֲכ֖וֹ <WH1288> hath blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> which the LORD

וְיִֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> give לְךָ֙ הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> Therefore God מִטַּל֙ <WH2919> thee of the dew הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וּמִשְׁמַנֵּ֖י <WH4924> and the fatness הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> and plenty דָּגָ֖ן <WH1715> of corn וְתִירֹֽשׁ׃ <WH8492> and wine

יַֽעַבְד֣וּךָ <WH5647> serve עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> Let people [וְיִשְׁתַּחוּ כ] (וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֤וּ <WH7812> bow ק) לְךָ֙ לְאֻמִּ֔ים <WH3816> thee and nations הֱוֵ֤ה <WH1933> to thee be גְבִיר֙ <WH1376> lord לְאַחֶ֔יךָ <WH251> over thy brethren וְיִשְׁתַּחֲוּ֥וּ <WH7812> bow down לְךָ֖ בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons אִמֶּ֑ךָ <WH517> and let thy mother's אֹרְרֶ֣יךָ <WH779> to thee cursed אָר֔וּר <WH779> [be] every one that curseth וּֽמְבָרֲכֶ֖יךָ <WH1288> thee and blessed בָּרֽוּךְ׃ <WH1288> [be] he that blesseth

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after כִּלָּ֣ה <WH3615> had made an end יִצְחָק֮ <WH3327> And it came to pass as soon as Isaac לְבָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> of blessing אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹב֒ <WH3290> Jacob וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַ֣ךְ <WH389> was yet יָצֹ֤א <WH3318> scarce יָצָא֙ <WH3318> gone out יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> and Jacob מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from the presence יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> of Isaac אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וְעֵשָׂ֣ו <WH6215> that Esau אָחִ֔יו <WH251> his brother בָּ֖א <WH935> came in מִצֵּידֽוֹ׃ <WH6718> from his hunting

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> And he also had made גַּם־ <WH1571> also הוּא֙ <WH1931> he מַטְעַמִּ֔ים <WH4303> savoury meat וַיָּבֵ֖א <WH935> and brought it לְאָבִ֑יו <WH1> unto his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לְאָבִ֗יו <WH1> unto his father יָקֻ֤ם <WH6965> arise אָבִי֙ <WH1> Let my father וְיֹאכַל֙ <WH398> and eat מִצֵּ֣יד <WH6718> venison בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> of his son's בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> that תְּבָרֲכַ֥נִּי <WH1288> may bless נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> that thy soul
